topic.title: The DITA map WebHelp with Feedback transformation

body.p: To watch our video demonstration about the feedback-enabled WebHelp system, go to http://oxygenxml.com/demo/Feedback_Enabled_WebHelp.html.

note.product: author developer editor authorEclipse developerEclipse editorEclipse

body.note: In case you need to automate the transformation process and use it outside of , you can use the Oxygen WebHelp plugin.
